datasheets.Scout_Sentinels.abilities.oth: At the start of your Shooting phase, select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this unit. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly ASTRA MILITARUM model makes an attack that targets that unit, re‐roll a Hit roll of 1.
datasheets.Scout_Sentinels.fluff: Scout Sentinels’ open compartments and simple augur devices enable their pilots to survey the enemy with ease, while their lighter armour and gyro-stabilisers assist them in swiftly traversing the roughest terrain and bringing their heavy weapons to bear suddenly from unanticipated angles.
datasheets.Scout_Sentinels.loadout: Every model is equipped with: multi-laser; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Scout_Sentinels.rangedWeapons: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.
datasheets.Scout_Sentinels.wargear.0: Any number of models can each be equipped with 1 hunter-killer missile.
datasheets.Scout_Sentinels.wargear.1: Any number of models can each be equipped with 1 Sentinel chainsaw.
datasheets.Scout_Sentinels.wargear.2: Any number of models can each have their multi-laser replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 autocannon ◦ 1 heavy flamer ◦ 1 lascannon ◦ 1 missile launcher ◦ 1 plasma cannon
datasheets.Cadian_Castellan.abilities.ot: While this model is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.
While this model is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.
datasheets.Cadian_Castellan.abilities.sp: This OFFICER can issue up to 2 Orders to REGIMENT units.
datasheets.Cadian_Castellan.fluff: Strategic senior officers often ranking as Captains or Colonels, Cadian Castellans are authoritative leaders of the fallen world’s forces. Bearing a panoply of armaments and insignia that mark their high office, they wield their weapons as skilfully as they command the soldiers beneath them.
datasheets.Cadian_Castellan.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ CADIAN SHOCK TROOPS ■ KASRKIN
datasheets.Cadian_Castellan.loadout: This model is equipped with: laspistol; chainsword.
datasheets.Cadian_Castellan.wargear.0: This model’s laspistol can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 bolt pistol ◦ 1 plasma pistol
datasheets.Cadian_Castellan.wargear.1: This model’s chainsword can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 boltgun and 1 close combat weapon ◦ 1 power fist ◦ 1 power weapon
datasheets.Gaunts_Ghosts.abilities.other: Models in this unit have the Benefit of Cover.

At the end of your opponent’s turn, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove this unit from the battlefield. In the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase, set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.
datasheets.Gaunts_Ghosts.abilities.speci: This unit’s OFFICER can issue up to 2 Orders to REGIMENT or GAUNT’S GHOSTS units.
datasheets.Gaunts_Ghosts.fluff: Colonel-Commissar Ibram Gaunt combines the positions of feared political officer and the regimental commander of the Tanith First and Only. Joined by the regiment’s stealthy and deadly officers and soldiers – those known as Gaunt’s Ghosts – Gaunt’s infamous raids, secretive missions and unlikely victories have cemented his legend.
datasheets.Gaunts_Ghosts.loadout:
Ibram Gaunt is equipped with: bolt pistol; Gaunt’s chainsword.
1 Tanith Ghost is equipped with: Corbec’s hot-shot lascarbine; straight silver knife.
1 Tanith Ghost is equipped with: Rawne’s lascarbine; straight silver knife.
1 Tanith Ghost is equipped with: Larkin’s long-las; straight silver knife.
1 Tanith Ghost is equipped with: Bragg’s autocannon; straight silver knife.
1 Tanith Ghost is equipped with: lascarbine; Mkoll’s straight silver knife.
datasheets.Gaunts_Ghosts.stats.0.name: Ibram Gaunt
datasheets.Gaunts_Ghosts.stats.1.name: Oan Mkoll
datasheets.Nork_Deddog.abilities.other.0: While one or more OFFICER models are in the same unit as this model, those OFFICER models have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.
datasheets.Nork_Deddog.abilities.other.1: Each time this model’s unit is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.
datasheets.Nork_Deddog.abilities.special:
At the start of the Declare Battle Formations step, this model must join one COMMAND SQUAD unit from your army (a COMMAND SQUAD cannot have more than one LOYAL PROTECTOR model joined to it). This model then counts as part of that COMMAND SQUAD for the rest of the battle, and its Starting Strength is increased accordingly. If it is not possible to join this model to a COMMAND SQUAD, it does not take part in the battle and counts as having been destroyed.

While this model is joined to a unit, it can embark within any TRANSPORT that unit can embark within, and takes up the space of 3 models.

This model cannot be selected as your WARLORD.
datasheets.Nork_Deddog.fluff: Nork Deddog’s loyalty and his skills as a bodyguard are beyond question. The hulking Ogryn would rather sustain terrible wounds than permit a single scratch on those he protects. Dozens of victories have been achieved thanks to his unthinking heroism as he shoots, eviscerates or head-butts any threat to his charges.
datasheets.Nork_Deddog.loadout: This model is equipped with: ripper gun; huge knife.
datasheets.Cadian_Shock_Troops.abilities: At the end of your Command phase, if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.
Each time you target the bearer’s unit with a Stratagem, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if there are one or more friendly OFFICER models within 6": on a 5+, you gain 1CP.
datasheets.Cadian_Shock_Troops.compositi: 1 Shock Trooper Sergeant and 9 Shock Troopers
2 Shock Trooper Sergeants and 18 Shock Troopers
datasheets.Cadian_Shock_Troops.fluff: Born soldiers, the Shock Troops of Cadia have trained their entire lives for military service with the Astra Militarum. Decades of rigorous firing drills have forged them into expert sharpshooters. Skilled in both dogged defence and storming assaults, Cadian Shock Troops are held by many as being the ideal soldiers.
datasheets.Cadian_Shock_Troops.loadout:
Every Shock Trooper Sergeant is equipped with: laspistol; chainsword.
Every Shock Trooper is equipped with: lasgun; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Cadian_Shock_Troops.wargear.0: Any number of Shock Trooper Sergeants can each have their laspistol and chainsword replaced with 1 Sergeant’s autogun and 1 close combat weapon.
datasheets.Cadian_Shock_Troops.wargear.1: Any number of Shock Trooper Sergeants can each have their laspistol replaced with 1 bolt pistol.
datasheets.Cadian_Shock_Troops.wargear.2: For every 10 models in this unit, 1 Shock Trooper equipped with a lasgun can be equipped with 1 vox-caster (that model’s lasgun cannot be replaced).
datasheets.Cadian_Shock_Troops.wargear.3: For every 10 models in this unit, up to 2 Shock Troopers can each have their lasgun replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 flamer ◦ 1 grenade launcher ◦ 1 meltagun ◦ 1 plasma gun   You cannot select the same weapon more than once per unit unless it contains 20 models, in which case you cannot select the same weapon more than twice per unit.
datasheets.Militarum_Tempestus_Command_S: Tempestor Prime
While this unit contains a Tempestor Prime, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.
This unit’s OFFICER can issue 1 Order to a REGIMENT unit.
Command Rod
While the bearer is leading a unit, that unit can be affected by up to two different Orders at the same time.
Regimental Standard
Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.
Master Vox
Each time the OFFICER in the bearer’s unit issues an Order, it can issue it to an eligible unit up to 24" away.
Medi-pack
At the start of your Command phase, if the bearer’s unit is below its Starting Strength, you can return up to D3 destroyed Tempestus Scions models to this unit.
1 Tempestor Prime
4 Tempestus Scions

Led by driven officers known as Tempestor Primes, the Command Squads of the Militarum Tempestus comprise veteran Tempestus Scions. These specialists guard and support the Tempestor Prime while the officer marshals their elite soldiers into the perfect positions for the mission at hand.
This unit can be attached to the following unit: ■ TEMPESTUS SCIONS

The Tempestor Prime is equipped with: bolt pistol; Tempestus dagger.
Every Tempestus Scion is equipped with: hot-shot lasgun; close combat weapon.
Tempestus dagger
Militarum Tempestus Command Squad
Hot-shot lasgun
Hot-shot volley gun
Hot-shot laspistol
Tempestus Scion

1 Tempestus Scion’s hot-shot lasgun can be replaced with 1 hot-shot laspistol and 1 master vox.
1 Tempestus Scion equipped with a hot‐shot lasgun can be equipped with 1 regimental standard (that model’s hot‐shot lasgun cannot be replaced).

Any number of Tempestus Scions can each have their hot-shot lasgun replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 flamer ◦ 1 grenade launcher ◦ 1 hot-shot volley gun ◦ 1 meltagun ◦ 1 plasma gun   You cannot select the same weapon from this list more than once per unit.
TEMPESTUS SCIONS
At the start of your Command phase, if this model is on the battlefield, you gain 1CP.

After both players have deployed their armies, select up to three ASTRA MILITARUM units from your army and redeploy them. When doing so, you can set those units up in Strategic Reserves if you wish, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.

This OFFICER can issue up to 3 Orders to:

■ REGIMENT units
■ SQUADRON units
If this model is in your army, it must be your WARLORD.
datasheets.Lord_Solar_Leontus.fluff: Arcadian Leontus wields entire armies of the Astra Militarum against apocalyptic invasions and sector-wide insurgencies. A war scholar and master tactician, the Lord Commander Solar bestrides the battlefield on his cybernetic stallion, Konstantin, levelling his blade at the foe as he bellows his orders.
datasheets.Lord_Solar_Leontus.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ ATTILAN ROUGH RIDERS ■ CADIAN SHOCK TROOPS ■ CATACHAN JUNGLE FIGHTERS ■ DEATH KORPS OF KRIEG ■ DEATH RIDERS ■ KASRKIN ■ KRIEG COMBAT ENGINEERS
datasheets.Lord_Solar_Leontus.loadout: This model is equipped with: Sol’s Righteous Gaze; Conquest; Konstantin’s hooves.
In your Movement phase, when this unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can perform a precision drop. If it does, this unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units, but until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge.

When this unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, the Tempestor Aquilon can shoot with its sentry weapon (its sentry flamer, sentry grenade launcher or sentry hot‐shot volley gun).

Designer’s Note: Place a servo‐sentry token next to this unit to remind you.
datasheets.Tempestus_Aquilons.fluff: Hand‐picked for their aggression and violent natures, Tempestus Aquilons deploy exclusively by grav‐drop, descending from the skies to land precisely where their destructive firepower is most keenly required. They are accompanied in these actions by automaton servo‐sentries that provide additional firepower as the assault is pressed home.
datasheets.Tempestus_Aquilons.loadout: The Tempestor Aquilon is equipped with: hot‐shot lascarbine; sentry flamer; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Tempestus_Aquilons.wargear.0: Up to two Tempestus Aquilons can each have their hot‐shot lascarbine replaced with 1 hot‐shot laspistol.
datasheets.Tempestus_Aquilons.wargear.1: One Tempestus Aquilon’s hot‐shot lascarbine can be replaced with 1 hot‐shot long‐las.
datasheets.Tempestus_Aquilons.wargear.2: One Tempestus Aquilon’s hot‐shot lascarbine can be replaced with 2 hot‐shot laspistols.
datasheets.Tempestus_Aquilons.wargear.3: One Tempestus Aquilon’s hot‐shot lascarbine can be replaced with 1 of the following:  ◦ 1 melta carbine  ◦ 1 plasma carbine
datasheets.Tempestus_Aquilons.wargear.4: The Tempestor Aquilon can be equipped with one of the following:  ◦ 1 bolt pistol  ◦ 1 hot‐shot laspistol
datasheets.Tempestus_Aquilons.wargear.5: The Tempestor Aquilon’s hot‐shot lascarbine can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 chainsword  ◦ 1 power weapon  ◦ 1 hot‐shot laspistol
datasheets.Tempestus_Aquilons.wargear.6: The Tempestor Aquilon’s sentry flamer can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 sentry hot‐shot volley gun  ◦ 1 sentry grenade launcher
datasheets.Krieg_Heavy_Weapons_Squad.abi: While the Fire Coordinator model is on the battlefield, each time a Heavy Weapons Gunner model is destroyed, roll one D6: on a 3+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can shoot after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

While embarked within a TRANSPORT, each Heavy Weapons Gunner model takes up the space of 2 models, and each weapon equipped by these models is considered to be 2 models’ weapons for the purposes of the Firing Deck ability.
datasheets.Krieg_Heavy_Weapons_Squad.flu: Death Korps Heavy Weapons Squads are deployed to support infantry assaults, forming overlapping fields of fire to pin down the enemy and enable waves of infantry to advance. Fire Coordinators direct the gunners under their command and ensure that they keep up a punishing rate of fire.
datasheets.Krieg_Heavy_Weapons_Squad.loa:
Each Heavy Weapons Gunner is equipped with: lascannon; laspistol; close combat weapon.
The Fire Coordinator is equipped with: laspistol; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Krieg_Heavy_Weapons_Squad.war: Any number of Heavy Weapons Gunners can each have their lascannon replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 Krieg heavy flamer ◦ 1 twin Krieg heavy stubber
datasheets.Ratlings.abilities.other.0.de: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can make a Normal move as if it were your Movement phase. If it does, until the end of the turn, this unit is not eligible to declare a charge.
The bearer’s unit has the GRENADES keyword.
Once per battle, when this unit is selected to shoot, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.
datasheets.Ratlings.fluff: Diminutive, keen‐eyed and instinctively stealthy, the abhuman Ratlings serve the Astra Militarum primarily as outstanding snipers; it is said they can take the head off a heretic with their rifles from over a mile away. Ratlings are also employed as infiltrators and forward scouts, able to observe the enemy unseen.
datasheets.Ratlings.loadout: Every model is equipped with: sniper rifle; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Ratlings.wargear.0: If this unit contains 10 models, it can be equipped with one Ratling Battlemutt.
datasheets.Ratlings.wargear.1: If this unit contains 10 models, one model can be equipped with demolition gear.
datasheets.Ratlings.wargear.2: If this unit contains 10 models, one model’s sniper rifle can be replaced with 1 tankstopper rifle.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Battle_Tank.abilit: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Each time this model makes an attack that targets an enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and, if that unit is within range of an objective marker you do not control, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Battle_Tank.fluff: The Leman Russ is the core battle tank of the Imperial Guard, forming the spearhead of countless armoured attacks. Those enemies that do not fall to the bombardment of their cannons and numerous hull-mounted guns are crushed mercilessly beneath their heavy treads.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Battle_Tank.loadou: This model is equipped with: lascannon; Leman Russ battle cannon; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Battle_Tank.wargea: This model can be equipped with 1 hunter-killer missile.
This model can be equipped with one of the following:  ◦ 1 heavy stubber ◦ 1 storm bolter
This model can be equipped with one of the following:  ◦ 2 heavy bolters ◦ 2 heavy flamers ◦ 2 multi-meltas ◦ 2 plasma cannons
This model’s lascannon can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 heavy bolter ◦ 1 heavy flamer
While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, subtract 4 from its Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
In your Shooting phase, just after selecting a target for this model’s Stormsword siege cannon, roll one D6 for the target unit and every other unit within 3" of that unit: on a 5+, the unit being rolled for is struck by a concussive wave. After this model has finished making its attacks against that target unit this phase, each unit struck by a concussive wave suffers D3 mortal wounds.
datasheets.Stormsword.fluff: A Stormsword is ideal for clearing enemy-held choke points. The shells fired by its siege cannon release a concentrated concussive wave on detonation. Those not pulverised outright are torn apart by slivers of the cover they cowered behind, barricades becoming lacerating shards and battlements storms of razor-edged fragments.
datasheets.Stormsword.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 lascannons; Stormsword siege cannon; twin heavy bolter; 2 twin heavy flamers; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Stormsword.wargear.0: This model can be equipped with one of the following:  ◦ 2 lascannons and 2 twin heavy bolters ◦ 2 lascannons and 2 twin heavy flamers
datasheets.Stormsword.wargear.1: This model’s 2 twin heavy flamers can be replaced with 2 twin heavy bolters.
In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a model that disembarked from this TRANSPORT this turn makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re‐roll the Hit roll.
datasheets.Taurox_Prime.fluff: The Taurox Prime incorporates arcane technologies not available to the wider Astra Militarum, enabling it and its Tempestus Scion cargo to operate in the most hazardous of war zones. More heavily armed than its namesake, it fulfils a tactical support role, with an adaptability suited to the Tempestus Scions.
datasheets.Taurox_Prime.loadout: This model is equipped with: Taurox battle cannon; twin Taurox hot-shot volley gun; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Taurox_Prime.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 12 MILITARUM TEMPESTUS INFANTRY or ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY CHARACTER models.
datasheets.Taurox_Prime.wargear.0: This model can be equipped with 1 storm bolter.
datasheets.Taurox_Prime.wargear.1: This model’s twin Taurox hot-shot volley gun can be replaced with 1 twin autocannon.
datasheets.Taurox_Prime.wargear.2: This model’s Taurox battle cannon can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 Taurox gatling cannon ◦ 1 Taurox missile launcher
datasheets.Field_Ordnance_Battery.abilit: While this unit is being affected by an Order, provided it Remained Stationary this turn, all Heavy weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.
datasheets.Field_Ordnance_Battery.fluff: Amongst the largest man-portable weapons fielded by the Astra Militarum are those crewed by Ordnance Teams. From bombast field guns that fire heavy shells indirectly, to the multiple warheads of the malleus rocket launcher or the searing energy lances unleashed by heavy lascannons, such batteries are powerful assets.
datasheets.Field_Ordnance_Battery.loadou: Every model is equipped with: malleus rocket launcher; lasgun; laspistol; battery close combat weapons.
datasheets.Field_Ordnance_Battery.wargea: Any number of models can each have their malleus rocket launcher replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 bombast field gun ◦ 1 heavy lascannon
datasheets.Cyclops_Demolition_Vehicle.ab: Each time this model or an enemy unit ends a move, if this model is within 3" of one or more enemy units, select one of those enemy units. This model is destroyed, but instead of rolling for its Deadly Demise ability, roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
When rolling for this model’s Deadly Demise ability, units within 6" suffer mortal wounds on a 4+, instead of on a 6.
This model can embark within an ASTRA MILITARUM TRANSPORT model as if it were an INFANTRY model. If it does, it takes up the space of 7 models.
datasheets.Cyclops_Demolition_Vehicle.fl: The Cyclops is a small tracked vehicle used for battlefield demolitions. While battle tanks and artillery pound enemy positions from range, a Cyclops is a weapon unto itself, packed with explosives that can sunder bastions, clear mines and obstacles or obliterate unsuspecting enemy troops.
datasheets.Cyclops_Demolition_Vehicle.lo: This model is equipped with: nothing.
datasheets.Rogal_Dorn_Commander.abilitie: While this model has 1‐6 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
Each time this model issues an Order, it can issue it to an eligible unit up to 12" away.
Each time this model is selected to shoot, you can re-roll one Hit roll, you can re-roll one Wound roll and you can re-roll one Damage roll when resolving its attacks.
This OFFICER can issue up to 2 Orders to SQUADRON units.
datasheets.Rogal_Dorn_Commander.fluff: Tank Commanders are given a degree of freedom to choose their preferred command vehicle. Some opt for the might of a Rogal Dorn, marking targets, issuing precise commands to turret and sponson gunners, and providing an example of efficiency and combat prowess to the squadrons in their charge.
datasheets.Rogal_Dorn_Commander.loadout: This model is equipped with: castigator gatling cannon; heavy stubber; twin battle cannon; armoured tracks.
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 2 heavy bolters ◦ 2 multi‐meltas
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 2 meltaguns ◦ 2 additional heavy stubbers
This model’s castigator gatling cannon can be replaced with 1 pulveriser cannon.
This model’s twin battle cannon can be replaced with 1 oppressor cannon and 1 coaxial autocannon.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Exterminator.abili: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks made with its exterminator autocannon. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly ASTRA MILITARUM unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. The same enemy unit can only be affected by this ability once per phase.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Exterminator.fluff: The Leman Russ Exterminator fills an adaptive role well-liked by commanders. Capable of laying down a withering hail of heavy fire, this tank’s shells can tear through lightly armoured chassis as easily as they rip through flesh and bone. Ranks of elite infantry are devastated with equal ease.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Exterminator.loado: This model is equipped with: exterminator autocannon; lascannon; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Bullgryn_Squad.abilities.othe: Each time an attack is allocated to a model in this unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.
datasheets.Bullgryn_Squad.abilities.warg: The bearer has a Wounds characteristic of 4.
The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.
datasheets.Bullgryn_Squad.fluff: The most obstinate of the Ogryn strain of abhumans, Bullgryns are clad in heavy armour and carry crude assault weaponry built to withstand the thunderous blows Bullgryns strike with them. A line of these heavily muscled humanoids, advancing in shield-lines from which shots bounce harmlessly, is a frightening sight.
datasheets.Bullgryn_Squad.loadout: Every model is equipped with: grenadier gauntlet; close combat weapon; slabshield.
datasheets.Bullgryn_Squad.stats.0.name: Bullgryn
datasheets.Bullgryn_Squad.wargear.0: Any number of models can each have their slabshield replaced with 1 brute shield.
datasheets.Bullgryn_Squad.wargear.1: Any number of models can each have their grenadier gauntlet replaced with 1 Bullgryn maul.
datasheets.Primaris_Psyker.abilities.oth: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

At the start of your opponent’s Shooting phase, you can roll one D6: on a 1, this PSYKER’s unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the end of the phase, models in this PSYKER’s unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.
datasheets.Primaris_Psyker.fluff: Primaris Psykers’ empyrically attuned minds are steeled against the manifold dangers risked by unsanctioned wielders of warp powers. These battle-trained psykers support the Astra Militarum’s wars with eerie foretelling, warding soldiers against the enemy’s witchcraft and unleashing tempests of their own psychic might.
datasheets.Primaris_Psyker.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ CADIAN SHOCK TROOPS ■ CATACHAN JUNGLE FIGHTERS ■ DEATH KORPS OF KRIEG ■ KASRKIN ■ KRIEG COMBAT ENGINEERS ■ TEMPESTUS SCIONS
datasheets.Primaris_Psyker.loadout: This model is equipped with: laspistol; Psychic Maelstrom; force weapon.
datasheets.Cadian_Heavy_Weapons_Squad.ab: Each time you target this unit with the Fire Overwatch Stratagem, while resolving that Stratagem, hits are scored on unmodified Hit rolls of 5+, or on unmodified Hit rolls of 4+ instead if this unit is within 6" of one or more friendly PLATOON units.

While embarked within a TRANSPORT, each model takes up the space of 2 models, and each weapon equipped by these models is considered to be 2 models’ weapons for the purposes of the Firing Deck ability.
datasheets.Cadian_Heavy_Weapons_Squad.fl: While massed infantry can overwhelm the foe, it often falls to Heavy Weapons Squads to deliver the killing blow. These teams of gun crews are able to swiftly set up their mobile heavy weapons. They bolster battle lines and provide close fire support with adaptable load-outs of precise or indiscriminate firepower.
datasheets.Cadian_Heavy_Weapons_Squad.lo: Every model is equipped with: heavy bolter; laspistol; weapons team close combat weapons.
datasheets.Cadian_Heavy_Weapons_Squad.wa: Any number of models can each have their heavy bolter replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 autocannon ◦ 1 lascannon ◦ 1 missile launcher ◦ 1 mortar
Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, re‐roll a Hit roll of 1 and re‐roll a Wound roll of 1.

Hailing from a death world teeming with horrific fauna, the Catachan people are well used to bringing down big game. Should the infantry find itself outmatched by lumbering monsters or heavy armour, Catachan Heavy Weapons Squads provide fire support, targeting the biggest and most lethal threats.
Every model is equipped with: heavy bolter; lasgun; weapons team close combat weapons.
Any number of models can each have their heavy bolter replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 autocannon ◦ 1 lascannon ◦ 1 missile launcher ◦ 1 mortar
This model does not suffer the penalty to its Hit rolls for making ranged attacks while enemy units are within Engagement Range of it.
datasheets.Hellhammer.fluff: The Hellhammer is optimised for close-quarters warfare, its armour proof against most infantry seeking to attack from nearby. The tank’s multiple rapid-firing guns shred exposed targets, while the concussive blast radius of its primary cannon pounds dug-in enemy lairs to dust.
datasheets.Hellhammer.loadout: This model is equipped with: coaxial autocannon; demolisher cannon; heavy stubber; Hellhammer cannon; 2 lascannons; twin heavy bolter; 2 twin heavy flamers; armoured tracks.
Friendly ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY models can be set up or end any type of move on top of the platform section of this FORTIFICATION.

Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this FORTIFICATION, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.
While an ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY model has the Benefit of Cover as a result of this terrain feature (see above), that model has a 4+ invulnerable save.

While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army:

■ That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
■ Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.

When this model is set up, it will consist of 1 platform section, up to 5 shield sections, up to 2 broken shield sections and up to 2 end sections. All sections must be connected to each other to form a continuous defence line; the 2 broken shield sections can be placed either at the end of the defence line, or in the middle of it such that both are within ½” of each other (in this case, these 2 sections count as being connected to each other). All of the sections that have been set up are then treated as a single model for all rules purposes.
datasheets.Aegis_Defence_Line.fluff: Aegis Defence Lines are barricades comprising crenellated armoured panels that link together in a solid shield-wall. Thanks to their simple design they can be built and deployed at great speed, and are thus ideal for establishing defensive perimeters before more permanent structures can be erected.
Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.
datasheets.Armoured_Sentinels.fluff: Modified with extra protective panelling, Armoured Sentinels are superb front-line hunters, wielding their deadly heavy weapons across terrain too cramped for battle tanks to operate on. As mobile hunter-killers, they excel in destroying vehicles, fortified bunkers and xenos monstrosities.
datasheets.Commissar.abilities.other.0.d: Once per battle round, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. If you do, one model in that unit is destroyed, and that unit is then no longer Battle-shocked.
datasheets.Commissar.abilities.other.1.d: While another OFFICER model is in the same unit as this model, you can re-roll Battle-shock tests taken for that unit.
datasheets.Commissar.abilities.special.0: This OFFICER can issue 1 Order to a REGIMENT unit. This OFFICER can only issue the Duty and Honour! and Fix Bayonets! Orders.
datasheets.Commissar.fluff: Commissars are ruthless officers charged with maintaining the morale, discipline and fighting spirit of their regiment. With the power to summarily execute any soldier or officer found wanting, they are feared, brooding figures. Their devotion to the Imperium is without doubt and they fight with fanatical bravery.
datasheets.Commissar.loadout: This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; chainsword.
datasheets.Commissar.wargear.0: This model’s chainsword can be replaced with 1 power weapon.
datasheets.Commissar.wargear.1: This model’s bolt pistol can be replaced with 1 plasma pistol.
datasheets.Deathstrike.abilities.other.0:
In your Shooting phase, each time this model is selected to shoot, if it has not shot with its Deathstrike missile this battle, you can do one of the following in addition to resolving this model’s ranged attacks:

■ Designate Target: If this model does not have a Deathstrike Target marker on the battlefield, place a unique Deathstrike Target marker for this model anywhere on the battlefield.

■ Adjust Target: If this model has a Deathstrike Target marker on the battlefield, move that marker to anywhere else on the battlefield.
datasheets.Deathstrike.fluff: The sanctioned use of a Deathstrike – designated ‘Ordnance Extremis’ – is often an excessive measure to combat the Imperial Guard’s most heinous enemies. Its huge missile, capable of mounting various catastrophic payloads, is able to visit the undimmed wrath of the Emperor on a foe half a world away.
datasheets.Deathstrike.loadout: This model is equipped with: Deathstrike missile; heavy bolter; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Deathstrike.rangedWeapons.1.a: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon in your Shooting phase, and only if it  this model is selected to shoot, if it has not shot with its Remained Stationary this turn and you did not use its Deathstrike Missile ability to Designate Target
datasheets.Deathstrike.wargear.1: This model’s heavy bolter can be replaced with 1 heavy flamer.
Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".
datasheets.Death_Riders.fluff: To ascend into the ranks of the Death Riders is a great honour for any soldier of Krieg. Astride their genetically enhanced Krieg steeds, these bold cavalry riders thunder across no man’s land with lances levelled and sabres drawn and crash into the foe, scattering infantry and creating gaps in the enemy line for infantry and armour to exploit.
datasheets.Death_Riders.loadout: Every model is equipped with: Death Rider lascarbine; frag lance; power sabre; steed’s savage claws.
datasheets.Death_Riders.stats.0.name: Ridemaster
datasheets.Death_Riders.stats.1.name: Death Rider
datasheets.Artillery_Team.abilities.othe: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if one or more of those attacks made with an Indirect Fire weapon scored a hit against an enemy unit, that unit must take a Battle‐shock test (if an INFANTRY unit is hit by one or more attacks made by a multiple rocket launcher, they must subtract 1 from their Battle‐shock test when doing so).
datasheets.Artillery_Team.fluff: The Astra Militarum make use of all manner of artillery pieces to annihilate the foe from extreme range. The various munitions hurled by these towed weapons are capable of eliminating entire squads of infantry, cracking open reinforced bunkers and laying waste to armoured convoys.
datasheets.Artillery_Team.loadout: This model is equipped with: heavy mortar; lasgun; crew close combat weapons.
datasheets.Artillery_Team.wargear.0: This model’s heavy mortar can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 siege cannon ◦ 1 heavy quad launcher ◦ 1 multiple rocket launcher
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Executioner.abilit: Each time this model makes an attack with its executioner plasma cannon that targets a unit that is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Hit roll.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Executioner.fluff: The Executioner’s plasma cannon fires with the fury of a miniature sun, incinerating tightly packed infantry and burning through vehicle armour with ease. Though extended engagements threaten containment breach of the main weapon, its gung-ho crews are known to risk death to kill ever more of the foe.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Executioner.loadou: This model is equipped with: executioner plasma cannon; lascannon; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Tempestus_Scions.abilities.ot: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re‐roll a Wound roll of 1. If the target of that attack is an enemy unit within range of an objective marker, you can re‐roll the Wound roll instead.
datasheets.Tempestus_Scions.fluff: Tempestus Scions are elite soldiers, well-trained in numerous combat styles, equipped to the highest standard and protected by reinforced carapace armour. Primed for a wide variety of specialist missions, their most common armament is an armour-piercing hotshot lasgun fitted with advanced sights.
datasheets.Tempestus_Scions.loadout:
The Tempestor is equipped with: hot-shot laspistol; chainsword.
Every Tempestus Scion is equipped with: hot-shot lasgun; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Tempestus_Scions.wargear.0: The Tempestor’s hot-shot laspistol can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 bolt pistol ◦ 1 plasma pistol
datasheets.Tempestus_Scions.wargear.1: The Tempestor’s chainsword can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 power fist ◦ 1 power weapon
datasheets.Tempestus_Scions.wargear.2: 1 Tempestus Scion’s hot-shot lasgun can be replaced with 1 hot-shot laspistol and 1 vox-caster.
datasheets.Tempestus_Scions.wargear.3: For every 5 models in this unit, up to two Tempestus Scions can each have their hot-shot lasgun replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 flamer ◦ 1 grenade launcher ◦ 1 hot-shot volley gun ◦ 1 meltagun ◦ 1 plasma gun   You cannot select the same weapon from this list more than once per unit, unless this unit contains 10 models, in which case you cannot select the same weapon more than twice per unit.
datasheets.Stormlord.abilities.other.0.d: At the end of your opponent’s Movement phase, if there are no models currently embarked within this TRANSPORT, you can select one friendly ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit (excluding ARTILLERY units) that is wholly within 6" of this TRANSPORT. Unless that unit is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can embark within this TRANSPORT.
datasheets.Stormlord.fluff: Boasting an expanded transport capacity, the Stormlord is the ultimate assault vehicle. From firing steps, the squads it carries level their own firepower at the enemy, but their shots are eclipsed by the hurricane of huge, mass-reactive shells unloaded by the twin barrels of the Stormlord’s vulcan mega-bolter.
datasheets.Stormlord.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 heavy stubbers; 2 lascannons; twin heavy bolter; 2 twin heavy flamers; vulcan mega-bolter; armoured tracks
datasheets.Stormlord.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 40 ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY models. Each OGRYN model takes up the space of 3 models. It cannot transport ARTILLERY models.
datasheets.Ogryn_Bodyguard.abilities.spe:
At the start of the Declare Battle Formations step, this model must join one COMMAND SQUAD unit from your army (a COMMAND SQUAD cannot have more than one LOYAL PROTECTOR model joined to it). This model then counts as part of that COMMAND SQUAD for the rest of the battle, and its Starting Strength is increased accordingly. If it is not possible to join this model to a COMMAND SQUAD, it does not take part in the battle and counts as having been destroyed.

While this model is joined to a unit, it can embark within any TRANSPORT that unit can embark within, and takes up the space of 3 models.

This model cannot be selected as your WARLORD and cannot be given Enhancements.
datasheets.Ogryn_Bodyguard.abilities.war: The bearer has a Wounds characteristic of 7.
datasheets.Ogryn_Bodyguard.fluff: Ogryn Bodyguards are particularly capable warriors of their kind who have but one duty – to protect the officer to whom they are assigned. Whether by throwing themselves in the line of fire or slaughtering all enemies who come near their ward, they are invaluable retainers in the swirl of battlefield combat.
datasheets.Ogryn_Bodyguard.loadout: This model is equipped with: ripper gun; close combat weapon; huge knife.
datasheets.Ogryn_Bodyguard.wargear.0: This model’s huge knife can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 brute shield ◦ 1 slabshield
datasheets.Ogryn_Bodyguard.wargear.1: This model’s ripper gun can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 grenadier gauntlet ◦ 1 Bullgryn maul
datasheets.Kasrkin.abilities.other.0.des: Once per battle round, at the start of any phase, you can select one Order to affect this unit until the start of your next Command phase, in addition to any other Orders issued to this unit by an OFFICER model this battle round.
datasheets.Kasrkin.abilities.wargear.0.d: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one enemy unit within 3" of the bearer and roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds, or 2D3 mortal wounds instead if it is a VEHICLE unit.
datasheets.Kasrkin.fluff: Amongst the lauded regiments of Cadia, the Kasrkin are the elite of the elite. These special operatives bear high-powered hot-shot lasguns and wear thick carapace armour. Disciplined and professional, the Kasrkin are peerless shots, and the equals or superiors of any unaugmented Human warriors.
datasheets.Kasrkin.loadout:
The Kasrkin Sergeant is equipped with: hot-shot laspistol; chainsword.
Every Kasrkin Trooper is equipped with: hot-shot lasgun; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Kasrkin.wargear.0: The Kasrkin Sergeant’s hot-shot laspistol can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 bolt pistol ◦ 1 plasma pistol
datasheets.Kasrkin.wargear.1: The Kasrkin Sergeant’s chainsword can be replaced with 1 power weapon.
datasheets.Kasrkin.wargear.2: 1 Kasrkin Trooper equipped with a hot-shot lasgun can be equipped with 1 vox-caster (that model’s hot-shot lasgun cannot be replaced).
datasheets.Kasrkin.wargear.3: 1 Kasrkin Trooper’s hot-shot lasgun can be replaced with 1 hot-shot laspistol and 1 melta mine.
datasheets.Kasrkin.wargear.4: 1 Kasrkin Trooper’s hot-shot lasgun can be replaced with 1 hot-shot marksman rifle.
datasheets.Kasrkin.wargear.5: Up to 4 Kasrkin Troopers can each have their hot-shot lasgun replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 flamer ◦ 1 grenade launcher ◦ 1 hot-shot volley gun ◦ 1 meltagun ◦ 1 plasma gun   You cannot select the same weapon from this list more than twice per unit
datasheets.Cadian_Command_Squad.abilitie: While this unit contains an OFFICER, each time a ranged attack targets this unit, if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, models in this unit have the Benefit of Cover against that attack.
At the start of your Command phase, if the bearer’s unit is below its Starting Strength, you can return up to D3 destroyed PLATOON models (excluding CHARACTERS) to this unit.
datasheets.Cadian_Command_Squad.fluff: Cadia’s officers are exceptional leaders. Trained to be the best, they expect no less from their troops. They are as inspiring as the standards carried in their wake and as motivational as the orders issued via their vox‐operators.
datasheets.Cadian_Command_Squad.leader: This unit can be attached to the following unit: ■ CADIAN SHOCK TROOPS
datasheets.Cadian_Command_Squad.loadout:
The Cadian Commander is equipped with: laspistol; chainsword.
1 Cadian Veteran Guardsman is equipped with: las pistol; chainsword.
1 other Cadian Veteran Guardsman is equipped with: lasgun; master vox; close combat weapon.
1 other Cadian Veteran Guardsman is equipped with: lasgun; medi-pack; close combat weapon.
1 other Cadian Veteran Guardsman is equipped with: lasgun; regimental standard; close combat weapon.
The Cadian Commander’s chainsword can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 power fist ◦ 1 power weapon

1 Cadian Veteran Guardsman’s chainsword can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 flamer and 1 close combat weapon ◦ 1 grenade launcher and 1 close combat weapon ◦ 1 meltagun and 1 close combat weapon ◦ 1 plasma gun and 1 close combat weapon ◦ 1 power fist ◦ 1 power weapon
The Cadian Commander’s laspistol can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 bolt pistol ◦ 1 plasma pistol
1 Cadian Veteran Guardsman’s laspistol can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 bolt pistol ◦ 1 plasma pistol
1 Cadian Veteran Guardsman’s lasgun and regimental standard can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 flamer ◦ 1 grenade launcher ◦ 1 meltagun ◦ 1 plasma gun
datasheets.Catachan_Command_Squad.abilit: While this unit contains an OFFICER, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.
datasheets.Catachan_Command_Squad.fluff: Catachan officers surround themselves with the most battle‐hardened veterans, for only they can be trusted to bear the regiment’s battle standards to war. Catachan Command Squads fight with the same aggression as their fellow soldiers, putting themselves in harm’s way in order to inspire their troops.
datasheets.Catachan_Command_Squad.leader: This unit can be attached to the following unit: ■ CATACHAN JUNGLE FIGHTERS
datasheets.Catachan_Command_Squad.loadou:
The Catachan Commander is equipped with: laspistol; close combat weapon.
Every Veteran Guardsman is equipped with: lasgun; laspistol; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Catachan_Command_Squad.name: Catachan Command Squad
datasheets.Catachan_Command_Squad.wargea: The Catachan Commander can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 boltgun ◦ 1 chainsword ◦ 1 power fist ◦ 1 power weapon
The Catachan Commander’s laspistol can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 bolt pistol ◦ 1 plasma pistol
1 Veteran Guardsman equipped with a lasgun can be equipped with 1 regimental standard.   A model can only take one of these options.
1 Veteran Guardsman equipped with a lasgun can be equipped 1 medi‐pack.
1 Veteran Guardsman equipped with a lasgun can be equipped with 1 master vox.

Any number of Veteran Guardsmen can each have their lasgun replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 flamer ◦ 1 grenade launcher ◦ 1 heavy flamer ◦ 1 meltagun ◦ 1 plasma gun ◦ 1 sniper rifle   You cannot select the same weapon from this list more than once per unit.
Each time this model’s magma cannon targets an enemy MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, that target is always considered to be within half range of that weapon.
datasheets.Doomhammer.fluff: Part mobile bastion and part close-range Titan-killer, the Doomhammer contains a sizeable troop compartment, enabling it to transport a number of battle-ready soldiers. At the front lines, the troops are deployed to engage light targets while the tank’s magma cannon melts monstrous chitin and armour to cinder and slag.
datasheets.Doomhammer.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 lascannons; magma cannon; twin heavy bolter; 2 twin heavy flamers; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Doomhammer.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 26 ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY models. Each OGRYN model takes up the space of 3 models. It cannot transport ARTILLERY models.
datasheets.Rogal_Dorn_Battle_Tank.abilit: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
Once per battle, when an attack is allocated to this model, you change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.
datasheets.Rogal_Dorn_Battle_Tank.fluff: The immense Rogal Dorn Battle Tank is a lumbering behemoth equally suited to anchoring a battle line or grinding forward in support of an assault. Bristling with immensely powerful guns, they pound breaches in the foe’s defences with enormous shells and riddle infantry with storms of bullet-fire.
datasheets.Rogal_Dorn_Battle_Tank.wargea: This model can be equipped with one of the following:  ◦ 2 heavy bolters ◦ 2 multi-meltas
This model can be equipped with one of the following:  ◦ 2 meltaguns ◦ 2 additional heavy stubbers
This model’s twin battle cannon can be replaced with 1 oppressor cannon and 1 co-axial autocannon.
datasheets.Ministorum_Priest.abilities.o: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.
Each time this model makes a melee attack, unless this model’s unit is Battle-shocked, you can re-roll the Hit roll.
datasheets.Ministorum_Priest.fluff: Serving amongst the Imperial Guard’s regiments to bolster the spiritual strength of its soldiers, Regimental Preachers are fiery zealots and fanatical orators. They do not shy away from combat, but wade amongst the foe, their voices raised in prayer to the God-Emperor and in furious castigation of the enemy.
datasheets.Ministorum_Priest.loadout: This model is equipped with: zealot’s vindictor.
datasheets.Ministorum_Priest.wargear.0: This model’s zealot’s vindictor can be replaced with 1 holy pistol and 1 power weapon.
datasheets.Death_Korps_of_Krieg.abilitie: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if this unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if this unit is Below Half-strength.

At the start of your Command phase, if the bearer’s unit is below its Starting Strength, you can return up to D3 destroyed Death Korps Troopers to this unit (if this unit contains two models equipped with a Death Korps medi‐pack, return up to D3+1 destroyed Death Korps Troopers to this unit instead).
datasheets.Death_Korps_of_Krieg.composit: 1 Death Korps Watchmaster and 9 Death Korps Troopers
2 Death Korps Watchmasters and 18 Death Korps Troopers
datasheets.Death_Korps_of_Krieg.fluff: The grim regiments of the Death Korps of Krieg excel in the most gruelling of conditions, their famous siege regiments resolutely holding key positions no matter the onslaught unleashed upon them. They are extollers of a pitiless cult of sacrifice, but with their legendary endurance, death often claims their foes first.
datasheets.Death_Korps_of_Krieg.loadout:
Every Death Korps Watchmaster is equipped with: laspistol; chainsword.
Every Death Korps Trooper is equipped with: lasgun; close combat weapon.
Any number of Death Korps Watchmasters can each have their laspistol replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 bolt pistol ◦ 1 plasma pistol
Any number of Death Korps Watchmasters can each replace their chainsword with 1 power weapon.
Any number of Death Korps Watchmasters can each replace their laspistol and chainsword with 1 boltgun and 1 close combat weapon.

For every 10 models in this unit, 1 Death Korps Trooper equipped with a lasgun can be equipped with 1 vox-caster (that model’s lasgun cannot be replaced).   A model can only take one of these options.
For every 10 models in this unit, 1 Death Korps Trooper equipped with a lasgun can be equipped with 1 Death Korps medi-pack (that model’s lasgun cannot be replaced).

For every 10 models in this unit, up to 2 Death Korps Troopers can each have their lasgun replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 flamer ◦ 1 grenade launcher ◦ 1 long-las ◦ 1 meltagun ◦ 1 plasma gun   You cannot select the same option more than once per unit unless it contains 20 models, in which case you cannot select the same option more than twice per unit.
datasheets.Banesword.abilities.other.0.d: Each time an attack made with this model’s quake cannon destroys an enemy model that has the Deadly Demise ability, that model’s Deadly Demise ability inflicts mortal wounds on a D6 roll of 3+ instead of on a 6.
datasheets.Banesword.fluff: The Banesword obliterates enemy vehicles and fortifications that prove insurmountable to the Imperial Guard’s remaining arsenal. Its quake cannon tears gaping voids in the strongest defensive lines at extreme range, enabling it to open breaches for allied forces to exploit before the enemy has a chance to return fire.
datasheets.Banesword.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 lascannons; quake cannon; twin heavy bolter; 2 twin heavy flamers; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Wyvern.abilities.other.0.name: Suppression Bombardment
datasheets.Wyvern.abilities.other.0.desc: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) that was hit by one or more of those attacks made with this model’s Wyvern quad stormshard mortar. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
datasheets.Wyvern.fluff: The Wyvern excels in claustrophobic urban combat, raining curtains of shells down upon luckless enemy infantry without needing to expose itself to harm. The suppression tank’s stormshard mortars are lethal to tightly packed foes, their shells detonating in blizzards of eviscerating Aquila-shaped flechettes.
datasheets.Wyvern.loadout: This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; Wyvern quad stormshard mortar; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Attilan_Rough_Riders.abilitie: This unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.
datasheets.Attilan_Rough_Riders.fluff: Hailing from the steppes of Attila, these horsemasters are potent cavalry troops. Their mobility makes them a powerful force, whether spearheading an attack or outflanking the foe. Though also equipped with grenades and sidearms, their deadliest weapon is their hunting lance, capable of bearing one of several deadly tips.
datasheets.Attilan_Rough_Riders.loadout: Every model is equipped with: lasgun; laspistol; hunting lance; steed’s hooves.
The Rough Rider Sergeant can be equipped with 1 power sabre.
For every 5 models in this unit, 1 model’s hunting lance can be replaced with 1 goad lance.
datasheets.Hellhound.abilities.other.0.d: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, that unit is scattered. While a unit is scattered, it cannot have the Benefit of Cover.
datasheets.Hellhound.fluff: Hellhounds are terrifying close assault tanks, designed to flush enemies out of dense terrain with gouts of promethium, clouds of noxious gas or the searing touch of thermal weaponry. Those few who volunteer to serve in these tanks often have a cavalier attitude, and revel in their reputation for reckless destruction.
datasheets.Hellhound.loadout: This model is equipped with: heavy flamer; inferno cannon; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Hellhound.wargear.1: This model’s heavy flamer can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 heavy bolter ◦ 1 multi-melta
datasheets.Hellhound.wargear.2: This model’s inferno cannon can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 chem cannon ◦ 1 melta cannon
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Punisher.abilities: Each time this model makes an attack with its punisher gatling cannon that targets an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES), that attack has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Punisher.fluff: The Punisher variant of the Leman Russ holds a dreaded reputation for mowing down enemy infantry in vast quantities. Its turret-mounted multi-barrelled cannon is an unsubtle sprayer of solid ammunition that applies the maxim of overwhelming firepower to overcome hordes of foes.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Punisher.loadout: This model is equipped with: lascannon; punisher gatling cannon; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Krieg_Command_Squad.abilities: While this unit contains an OFFICER, you can target this unit with Stratagems even while it is Battle-shocked and Orders issued to this unit do not cease to affect this unit if it becomes Battle-shocked.
The bearer’s unit has the Feel No Pain 6+ ability against mortal wounds.
Once per battle, when issuing an Order, the Lord Commissar can issue one additional Order.
datasheets.Krieg_Command_Squad.fluff: The Death Korps of Krieg’s officer korps are brave bordering on reckless. Their casualty rates are such that it is not uncommon for a representative of the Officio Prefectus, most commonly a high‐ranking Commissar, to step into their place and take command, ably assisted by a retinue of veterans and junior officers.
datasheets.Krieg_Command_Squad.leader: This unit can be attached to the following units: ■ DEATH KORPS OF KRIEG ■ KRIEG COMBAT ENGINEERS
datasheets.Krieg_Command_Squad.loadout:
The Lord Commissar is equipped with: laspistol; power weapon.
One Veteran Guardsman is equipped with: laspistol; chainsword.
One Veteran Guardsman is equipped with: laspistol; close combat weapon; alchemyk counteragents; servo‐scribes.
One Veteran Guardsman is equipped with: lasgun; close combat weapon; master vox.
One Veteran Guardsman is equipped with: lasgun; close combat weapon; regimental standard.
One Veteran Guardsman is equipped with: boltgun; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Krieg_Command_Squad.wargear.0: 1 Veteran Guardsman not equipped with alchemyk counteragents can replace its laspistol with one of the following: ◦ 1 bolt pistol ◦ 1 plasma pistol
datasheets.Krieg_Command_Squad.wargear.1: 1 Veteran Guardsman’s chainsword can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 trench club ◦ 1 power weapon
datasheets.Krieg_Command_Squad.wargear.2: The Lord Commissar can be equipped with 1 plasma pistol.
datasheets.Krieg_Command_Squad.wargear.3: The Lord Commissar’s power weapon can be replaced with 1 power fist.
datasheets.Krieg_Command_Squad.wargear.4: 1 Veteran Guardsman’s boltgun can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 flamer ◦ 1 grenade launcher ◦ 1 meltagun ◦ 1 plasma gun
datasheets.Sly_Marbo.abilities.other.0.d: Once per turn, in your opponent’s Shooting phase, when an enemy unit makes a ranged attack that targets a friendly REGIMENT unit within 3" of this model, after that enemy unit has shot, this model can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.
datasheets.Sly_Marbo.abilities.other.1.d: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move. If it does, until the end of the turn, this model is not eligible to declare a charge.
datasheets.Sly_Marbo.abilities.special.0: This model cannot be selected as your WARLORD.
datasheets.Sly_Marbo.fluff: Sly Marbo is a one-man army. He operates alone, striking from ambush before disappearing back into the shadows. A legendary soldier, Marbo has gutted xenos horrors and slit the throats of traitors beyond count with his envenomed blade, and fires hails of poisoned shards from his ripper pistol.
datasheets.Sly_Marbo.loadout: This model is equipped with: ripper pistol; envenomed blade.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Demolisher.abiliti: When making ranged attacks with its demolisher battle cannon, this model can target enemy units within Engagement Range of it (provided no other friendly units are also within Engagement Range of that enemy unit). In addition, when making ranged attacks, this model does not suffer the penalty to its Hit rolls for being within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Demolisher.fluff: The Leman Russ Demolisher excels in line-breaking. Its short-ranged but highly destructive demolisher cannon makes the battle tank utterly lethal in close-range firefights, where its thick armour enables it to bludgeon its way through enemy fire to close the gap on their lines before explosively forcing a breach.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Demolisher.loadout: This model is equipped with: demolisher battle cannon; lascannon; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Taurox.abilities.other.0.name: Rapid Deployment
datasheets.Taurox.abilities.other.0.desc: Units can disembark from this TRANSPORT after it has Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move that phase, and cannot declare a charge in the same turn, but can otherwise act normally.
datasheets.Taurox.fluff: Designed to exploit gaps in the enemy battle line or plug holes torn in the Astra Militarum’s own, the Taurox is a swift armoured transport, its rugged tracks enabling it to cross difficult terrain with ease. The Taurox’s autocannons mow down the foe as it roars forward, eliminating threats to its passengers as they rapidly deploy.
datasheets.Taurox.loadout: This model is equipped with: twin autocannon; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Taurox.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY models. Each OGRYN model takes up the space of 3 models. It cannot transport ARTILLERY models.
datasheets.Ogryn_Squad.abilities.other.0: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
datasheets.Ogryn_Squad.fluff: Ogryns are simple beings. In battle, their instincts rarely lead them beyond hitting the enemy as hard as possible. The rapid-firing ripper guns they carry are built to withstand use as improvised clubs. Ogryns make excellent shock troops, their physiques shrugging off damage before they charge, hitting like a tank.
datasheets.Ogryn_Squad.loadout: Every model is equipped with: ripper gun.
The first time this model is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with D3 wounds remaining.
Each time this model’s unit makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.
This OFFICER can issue up to 3 Orders to REGIMENT units.
datasheets.Lord_Marshal_Dreir.fluff: As is tradition in the armies of Krieg, Lord Marshal Varnan Dreir leads from the front, despite his lofty rank, often to the horror of his superiors. That he and his loyal Krieg steed have emerged from so many battles alive and victorious speaks to his skill as both commander and cavalry soldier.
datasheets.Lord_Marshal_Dreir.leader: This unit can be attached to the following unit: ■ DEATH RIDERS
datasheets.Lord_Marshal_Dreir.loadout: This model is equipped with: laspistol; Sabre of Sacrifice; savage claws.
datasheets.Tech_Priest_Enginseer.abiliti: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

In your Command phase, select one friendly ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE model within 3" of this model. That VEHICLE model regains up to D3 lost wounds and, until the start of your next Command phase, that VEHICLE model has a 4+ invulnerable save. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn.
If a friendly ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE model is destroyed within 12" of this model, until the end of the battle, this model’s Enginseer axe has an Attacks characteristic of 6.
datasheets.Tech_Priest_Enginseer.fluff: Adepts of the Omnissiah, Enginseers are robed machine-mystics tasked with using arcane lore and cybernetic arrays to effect battlefield repairs upon damaged fighting machines. To them, every war engine is a priceless artefact of technology, whose spirit need only be roused once more to take revenge on the enemy.
datasheets.Tech_Priest_Enginseer.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ CADIAN SHOCK TROOPS ■ CATACHAN JUNGLE FIGHTERS ■ DEATH KORPS OF KRIEG ■ KASRKIN ■ KRIEG COMBAT ENGINEERS
datasheets.Tech_Priest_Enginseer.loadout: This model is equipped with: Mechanicus pistol; Enginseer axe; servo-arm.
In your Shooting phase, just after selecting a target for this model’s tremor cannon, the target unit and every other enemy INFANTRY unit within 3" of that unit must take a Battle-shock test.
datasheets.Banehammer.fluff: Where the Banehammer excels is as a defensive anchor in the Imperial Guard’s formations. Those enemies not blasted apart by its tremor cannon’s shells are brought to a crawl as the ground splits beneath them. The stunned foe is then forced to push slowly forward beneath a further barrage, or else retreat in disarray.
datasheets.Banehammer.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 lascannons; tremor cannon; twin heavy bolter; 2 twin heavy flamers; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Catachan_Jungle_Fighters.abil: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, if this unit made a Charge move or was charged this turn, add 1 to the Wound roll.
datasheets.Catachan_Jungle_Fighters.comp: 1 Jungle Fighter Sergeant and 9 Jungle Fighters
2 Jungle Fighter Sergeants and 18 Jungle Fighters
datasheets.Catachan_Jungle_Fighters.fluf: These heavily muscled soldiers are drawn from a warrior people that survive on the most infamous of death worlds. Skilled in deadly close combat with the fiercest of beasts amidst hazardous terrain, Jungle Fighters are also skilled infiltrators and trackers, adept at luring their prey into fiendish traps.
datasheets.Catachan_Jungle_Fighters.load:
Every Jungle Fighter Sergeant is equipped with: laspistol; close combat weapon.
Every Jungle Fighter is equipped with: lasgun; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Catachan_Jungle_Fighters.warg: For every 10 models in this unit, 1 Jungle Fighter equipped with a lasgun can be equipped with 1 vox-caster (that model’s lasgun cannot be replaced).
For every 5 models in this unit, 1 Jungle Fighter’s lasgun can be replaced with 1 flamer.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Commander.abilitie: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6: on a 2+, do not remove it from play – it can, after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, shoot as if it were your Shooting phase and as if it had its full wounds remaining. This model is then removed from play.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Commander.fluff: The venerable Leman Russ makes an excellent command tank. Many officers choose these reliable vehicles, broadcasting orders to other war engines and, when necessary, emerging from their cupola to bellow orders and provide a visible symbol of Imperial power.
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 2 heavy bolters ◦ 2 heavy flamers ◦ 2 multi-meltas ◦ 2 plasma cannons

This model’s Leman Russ battle cannon can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 demolisher battle cannon ◦ 1 eradicator nova cannon ◦ 1 executioner plasma cannon ◦ 1 exterminator autocannon ◦ 1 punisher gatling cannon ◦ 1 vanquisher battle cannon
datasheets.Valkyrie.abilities.damaged.de: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
datasheets.Valkyrie.abilities.other.0.de: At the end of your opponent’s Movement phase, one or more units embarked within this TRANSPORT can disembark from it.
datasheets.Valkyrie.fluff: Well-armed and heavily armoured, Valkyries are agile carrier-gunships with experienced crews. Their pilots weave them through enemy fighters and ground fire to deliver their payload of soldiers, dropping them from high altitude via grav-chutes or hovering at lower levels while the troops jump out to storm the landing zone.
datasheets.Valkyrie.loadout: This model is equipped with: hellstrike missiles; Militarum multi-laser; armoured hull.
datasheets.Valkyrie.wargear.0: This model can be equipped with 2 heavy bolters.
datasheets.Valkyrie.wargear.1: This model’s hellstrike missiles can be replaced with 2 multiple rocket pods.
datasheets.Valkyrie.wargear.2: This model’s multi-laser can be replaced with 1 lascannon.
While this model is leading a unit, that unit can be affected by up to two different Orders at the same time.

Once per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can use it when a friendly REGIMENT unit within 12" of that model is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that usage of that Stratagem by 1CP.
datasheets.Ursula_Creed.fluff: The Lord Castellan of Cadia is a forbidding and implacable strategist, and a symbol of the enduring indomitability of Cadia’s armies. Ursula Creed’s superior generalship, forged over long years, has seen her lead numerous Imperial armies to victory against the enemies that threaten the Imperium.
datasheets.Ursula_Creed.loadout: This model is equipped with: Duty and Vengeance; power weapon.
datasheets.Shadowsword.abilities.other.0: Each time this model makes a ranged attack with its volcano cannon that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, that attack has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.
datasheets.Shadowsword.fluff: The Shadowsword is designed to bring a swift and crushing end to drawn out engagements against the most titanic opposition. Its volcano cannon emits a laser beam so powerful that infantry and vehicles are atomised, while its favoured super-heavy prey are cored and toppled by the lance of thrumming energy.
datasheets.Shadowsword.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 lascannons; twin heavy bolter; 2 twin heavy flamers; volcano cannon; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Manticore.abilities.other.0.d: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) that was hit by one or more of those attacks made with this model’s storm eagle rockets. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, that enemy unit is staggered. While a unit is staggered, subtract 1 from the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit (to a minimum of 1).
datasheets.Manticore.fluff: Capable of firing its limited supply of storm eagle rockets to unleash furious barrages at incredible distances, the Manticore can lay waste to enemy formations. Multiple warheads release a moment before each rocket’s impact, signalling the panicking foe’s doom no matter how far they try to flee at the last moment.
datasheets.Manticore.loadout: This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; storm eagle rockets; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Chimera.abilities.other.0.des: In your Command phase, one OFFICER model embarked within this TRANSPORT can issue Orders even though it is not on the battlefield. When doing so, measure distances to and from this TRANSPORT.
datasheets.Chimera.fluff: A workhorse armoured troop carrier, the Chimera is a durable and practical tank, employed to ferry infantry into the harshest war zones. While embarked, its passengers operate the tank’s in-built lasgun arrays in safety; once they dismount, the Chimera provides fire support with its versatile heavy weapons.
datasheets.Chimera.loadout: This model is equipped with: multi-laser; heavy bolter; lasgun array; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Chimera.wargear.2: This model’s multi-laser can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 heavy bolter ◦ 1 heavy flamer   This weapon cannot be replaced.*
datasheets.Avenger_Strike_Fighter.abilit: Once per turn, in your opponent’s Shooting phase, when another friendly ASTRA MILITARUM unit within 6" of this model is destroyed by an attack made by a unit that can FLY, one model from your army with this ability can use it. If it does, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, that model can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).
datasheets.Avenger_Strike_Fighter.fluff: The Avenger is a dedicated strike fighter, designed to conduct high-speed, low-level attacks on ground targets. Armoured vehicle formations and high-value strategic assets are the Avenger’s principal prey, the aircraft’s bolt cannon giving it a tank-killing capability that exceeds most other Imperial flyers of its size.
datasheets.Avenger_Strike_Fighter.loadou: This model is equipped with: Avenger bolt cannon; heavy stubber; 2 lascannons; armoured hull.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Vanquisher.abiliti: Each time this model makes a ranged attack with its vanquisher battle cannon that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Vanquisher.fluff: No other battle tank of the Imperial Guard possesses more raw stopping power than the Leman Russ Vanquisher. Often deployed against heavily armoured enemies, the long range and high first-hit kill ratio of its main armament make it the anti-tank weapon of choice for many commanders.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Vanquisher.loadout: This model is equipped with: lascannon; vanquisher battle cannon; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Basilisk.abilities.other.0.de: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if one or more of those attacks made with its earthshaker cannon scored a hit against an enemy Infantry unit, until the start of your next Shooting phase, that unit is shaken. While a unit is shaken, subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for it.
datasheets.Basilisk.fluff: Basilisks are self-propelled artillery tanks, armed with a fearsome earthshaker cannon. Able to keep pace with infantry advances – their barrels levelled for direct fire – or deploy to rear positions from which they unleash relentless shelling, Basilisks are amongst the most numerous of the Imperial Guard’s ordnance tanks.
datasheets.Basilisk.loadout: This model is equipped with: earthshaker cannon; heavy bolter; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Baneblade.abilities.other.0.d: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to an ASTRA MILITARUM model from your army, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this BANEBLADE model, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.
datasheets.Baneblade.fluff: More rolling fortress than vehicle, Baneblade super-heavy tanks are possessed of overwhelming firepower. Wherever a Baneblade sees battle, it becomes the centre of the battle line, Imperial Guardsmen and even smaller tanks sheltering in its lee as its enormous primary cannon and numerous other guns pulverise the foe.
datasheets.Baneblade.loadout: This model is equipped with: Baneblade cannon; co-axial autocannon; demolisher cannon; heavy stubber; 2 lascannons; twin heavy bolter; 2 twin heavy flamers; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Krieg_Combat_Engineers.abilit: Once per turn, you can target this unit with the Grenade Stratagem for 0CP.

Once per battle, at the start of your Shooting phase, you can select one enemy unit within 9" of and visible to the bearer and roll one D6: on a 3+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds, or 2D3 mortal wounds instead if it is a VEHICLE or FORTIFICATIONS unit.
datasheets.Krieg_Combat_Engineers.fluff: The Engineer Korps of Krieg are renowned for their skill as demolitions experts, sappers and close‐quarters trench fighters. It is their task to accompany the first waves of a Death Korps assault, clearing razorwire and defusing mines before bringing their shotguns and trench clubs to bear upon the enemy.
datasheets.Krieg_Combat_Engineers.loadou: Every model is equipped with: autopistol; trench club.
datasheets.Krieg_Combat_Engineers.wargea: The Krieg Engineer Watchmaster’s trench club can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 chainsword ◦ 1 power weapon
The Krieg Engineer Watchmaster’s autopistol can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 bolt pistol ◦ 1 hand flamer ◦ 1 plasma pistol
Any number of models can each have their autopistol and trench club replaced with 1 combat shotgun and 1 close combat weapon.
1 Krieg Combat Engineer’s autopistol and trench club can be replaced with 1 autopistol, 1 remote mine and 1 close combat weapon.
1 Krieg Combat Engineer’s autopistol and trench club can be replaced with 1 flamer and 1 close combat weapon.
datasheets.Hydra.abilities.other.0.name: Flak Battery
datasheets.Hydra.abilities.other.0.descr: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a unit that can FLY, you can re-roll the Hit roll.
datasheets.Hydra.fluff: A primary anti-aircraft asset, the Hydra is a flak tank equipped with an array of specially adapted autocannons. As many allied tanks are vulnerable from the air, the Hydra is highly valuable. Once it locks on to enemy aircraft, even the most evasive targets cannot escape its storm of shells.
datasheets.Hydra.loadout: This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; Hydra autocannon; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Eradicator.abiliti: Each time a ranged attack targets this model, if this model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Eradicator.fluff: The nova cannon carried by Leman Russ Eradicators fires shells containing a sub-atomic core. Their detonations produce powerful shock waves that pulverise enemy barricades and the infantry sheltering behind them. This battle tank is therefore a mainstay in the dense confines of urban firefights.
datasheets.Leman_Russ_Eradicator.loadout: This model is equipped with: eradicator nova cannon; lascannon; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Elysian_Drop_Sentinel.abiliti: When this model is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can perform a meteoric descent. If it does, this model can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 3" horizontally away from all enemy units, but until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge.
datasheets.Elysian_Drop_Sentinel.loadout: This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Elysian_Drop_Sentinel.wargear: This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 heavy flamer ◦ 1 multi-melta
datasheets.Arvus_Lighter.abilities.other: If this model starts the game in Hover mode and in Strategic Reserves, it can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules.
datasheets.Arvus_Lighter.loadout: This model is equipped with: armoured hull.
datasheets.Arvus_Lighter.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 12 Astra Militarum Infantry models. Each Heavy Weapons Team model and Veteran Heavy Weapons Team model takes up the space of 2 models. It cannot transport Ogryn or Artillery models.
datasheets.Tauros_Assault_Vehicle.abilit: Each time this model Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of this model.
datasheets.Tauros_Assault_Vehicle.loadou: This model is equipped with: heavy flamer; armoured frame.
datasheets.Tauros_Assault_Vehicle.wargea: This model’s heavy flamer can be replaced with 1 Tauros grenade launcher.
